PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Stay ahead of the curve by exploring our curated collection of innovative products from emerging brands and startups.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Our algorithm learns your preferences and suggests products tailored to your unique tastes and interests.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Get exclusive early access to limited-edition releases and pre-order campaigns before they hit the mainstream.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Stay ahead of the curve with ProductScout. Our team scours the globe to bring you the latest and greatest product releases across all industries. Sign up for our newsletter to get exclusive access to cutting-edge offerings.
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_LOGIN_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Log in to find new products
SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay ahead of the curve with our product discovery platform.
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from people who have discovered amazing products with our app.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app is a game-changer for finding unique and innovative products. I've discovered so many cool items I never would have known about otherwise.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a busy professional, I don't have time to scour the internet for the latest products. This app does the hard work for me and curates a selection of the best new items.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love supporting small businesses and independent creators. This app has introduced me to so many amazing products from talented makers around the world.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Explore the latest and greatest products from emerging brands.
CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get in Touch for New Product Discoveries
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let us know what you're looking for and we'll help you find the latest innovations.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Control your home with voice commands and automation
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Immersive sound and long battery life on-the-go

CTA_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our app that curates the latest and greatest products from innovative brands across various industries.
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Unlock a World of New Product Experiences
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Product Discovery App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the app help me find new products?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms to analyze your preferences and browsing history, then recommends exciting new products tailored just for you. Stay ahead of the trends!
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What kinds of products can I discover?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: From the latest tech gadgets to trendy fashion items, our app covers a wide range of product categories to match your diverse interests.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Is the app free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, downloading and using our product discovery app is completely free. We make money through affiliate partnerships when you make a purchase.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How can I provide feedback or report issues?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We value your input! Use the in-app feedback form to submit comments, suggestions or report any technical issues you encounter.
NEWSLETTER_BUTTON_CTA_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Sign Up to Get Exclusive Updates
HERO_SUBTITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge product discovery platform.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to commonly asked questions about our app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app helps you find and explore the newest products across various categories and brands. Stay up-to-date with the latest releases and innovations.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does the product discovery work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Our app uses advanced algorithms and data from multiple sources to curate a constantly updated feed of newly launched products. You can filter and sort based on your preferences.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I get notified about products I'm interested in?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, you can set up alerts for specific product categories, brands, or keywords. We'll notify you as soon as a matching new product is added to our database.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: The basic version of our app is free to download and use. We offer a premium subscription with additional features like in-depth product analyses and early access to new product info.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How can I provide feedback or report an issue?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: We value your input! You can contact our support team through the in-app chat or by emailing support@newproductfinder.com. We're always working to improve our app based on user feedback.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Our advanced algorithms analyze your preferences and browsing history to suggest products tailored just for you.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our constantly updated catalog featuring the hottest new arrivals and must-have items.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Get valuable insights from real customers who have tried the products, helping you make informed buying decisions.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Visualize how selected products would look on you with our innovative virtual try-on feature, ensuring the perfect fit.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Create wishlists for future purchases and get notified when your desired items go on sale or become available.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Our app is your personal shopping assistant, making it easy to discover exciting new products wherever you are.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Our app helps you uncover innovative new products before they go mainstream. Stay ahead of the curve.
